mapper.select: select * from Ticket where id=#{id} order by dayInfo;
SELECT * from Ticket where id = #{id} and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') >= dayInfo and date_format(now(), '%H:%i') > timeInfo order by dayInfo;
SELECT * from Ticket where id =#{id} and dayInfo > date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') order by dayInfo;
SELECT * from Ticket where id =#{id} and dayInfo = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and timeInfo > date_format(now(), '%H:%i') order by dayInfo;
mapper.insert: insert into Ticket(id, titleInfo, hallInfo, dayInfo, timeInfo, numberOfAdult, numberOfTeen, seats, price) VALUES(#{id},#{titleInfo},#{hallInfo},#{dayInfo},#{timeInfo},#{numberOfAdult},#{numberOfTeen},#{seats},#{price});
mapper.select: select seats from Ticket where hallInfo=#{hallInfo} and dayInfo=#{dayInfo} and timeInfo =#{timeInfo};
select * from Ticket where hallInfo=#{hallInfo} and dayInfo=#{dayInfo} and timeInfo =#{timeInfo} and seats like concat('%',#{seats},'%');
